text.div:
VhDir Healthcare Service Characteristic

This code system contains codes for documenting the attributes of a health care services.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/vhdir/CodeSystem/healthcareservice-characteristic defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
limitedhrs Limited HoursThe hours of this service may be limited and subject to frequent variation. Please be sure to contact this location for current information.

name: VhDir_cs_healthcareservice_characteristic
title: VhDir Healthcare Service Characteristic
description: This code system contains codes for documenting the attributes of a health care services.

concept.definition: The hours of this service may be limited and subject to frequent variation. Please be sure to contact this location for current information.
